description:
To help us understand developing financial inclusion markets we should focus on, submit a research document on as many of the following countries as possible pertaining to the following information:
Tanzania, Mali, Senegal, El Salvador, Congo Dem. Republic, Kyrgyzstan, Cambodia, Turkmenistan, Central African Republic, Yemen, Niger, Guinea, Burundi, Madagascar, Afghanistan, Iraq, Tajikistan, Cameroon, Djibouti, Chad, Pakistan, Egypt, Burkina Faso, Kenya, Gabon, Algeria, Argentina, Peru, Brazil.
For each country research the following, 
1. Marketing strategies (what sorts of advertisements would be successful)
2. Fintech Market - current presence and areas for growth
2. Roles of women - levels of freedom, rights, money-management, etc
name: DRAFT - Mifos - Market Geographical Research
